issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

fields.summary: Implement support for NULLS FIRST/NULLS LAST

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: As we do not control what is written in the physical layer and thus we cannot ensure NULLS ORDER (and even if we did, currently we do not take advantage of it), it seems exposing the NULLS ORDER property at metastore level does not make much sense. We will revert that part of patch HIVE-12994.
fields.summary: Revert changes in HIVE-12994 related to metastore

ATTACHMENT ID: 12791556 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build

[~jcamachorodriguez], shall we get this in ASAP as it blocks changes in HIVE-11160 of thrift code? The changes in HIVE-12994 also affects serde and now if we run {code}mvn install -Pthriftif -DskipTests -Dthrift.home=/usr/local{code} to regenerate thrift code, it will give us error 
{code}
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-compiler-plugin:3.1:compile (default-compile) on project hive-serde: Compilation failure: Compilation failure:
[ERROR] /home/pxiong/Project/hive/hive/serde/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde2/binarysortable/BinarySortableSerDe.java:[127,60] cannot find symbol
[ERROR] symbol:   variable SERIALIZATION_NULL_SORT_ORDER
[ERROR] location: class org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde.serdeConstants
[ERROR] /home/pxiong/Project/hive/hive/serde/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde2/binarysortable/BinarySortableSerDe.java:[127,60] cannot find symbol
[ERROR] symbol:   variable SERIALIZATION_NULL_SORT_ORDER
[ERROR] location: class org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde.serdeConstants
[ERROR] /home/pxiong/Project/hive/hive/serde/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde2/binarysortable/BinarySortableSerDe.java:[187,36] cannot find symbol
[ERROR] symbol:   variable SERIALIZATION_NULL_SORT_ORDER
[ERROR] location: class org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde.serdeConstants
[ERROR] -> [Help 1]
{code} 

And the patch in this JIRA works for me. Thanks.
Fails are just q file updates. [~ashutoshc], could you take a look? [~pxiong], this will indeed fix the thrift issue.
